results.content: This probably was the authors first course that he thought. There are a lot of trials and errors. It is hands on and does help create a app in a short time without any theory or background. I ran into errors after completing the course. Hoping to find answers.

results.content: It will only take a couple of hours to finish this and at the end you get a cool app that is fun to explore popular photos on instagram. Amazing fun with instagram's API!
results.content_html: It will only take a couple of hours to finish this and at the end you get a cool app that is fun to explore popular photos on instagram. Amazing fun with instagram's API!

results.content: One of the best ways to learn something new, is to actually do it I believe, and this is what this course is all about: creating a web application. The teacher has an idea of what he wants to transport and he sticks to the information you need. The course is overall structured and you get what you paid for, and overview of Node.js. Very well detailed class and straight to the point. I recommend this for new learners as much as a good refresher too.
results.content_html: One of the best ways to learn something new, is to actually do it I believe, and this is what this course is all about: creating a web application. The teacher has an idea of what he wants to transport and he sticks to the information you need. The course is overall structured and you get what you paid for, and overview of Node.js. Very well detailed class and straight to the point. I recommend this for new learners as much as a good refresher too.
